requests.title: Send me to Greece
requests.description: Its raining in Portland and I want to visit the Mediteranean Sea

requests.title: Help me remove my tonsils
requests.description: I hate my tonsils. I want them gone. Help me to reach my goal.

requests.title: Help me open a food cart
